import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  governance_vote
</h1>





The vote method submits a new vote. If the node has the right to vote based on governance mode, the vote can be placed. If not, an error message will be returned and the vote will be ignored.

**JSONRPC:** `governance_vote`


## Request

An error occurred on the server while parsing the JSON text. |\n|-32602 | Invalid params | Invalid method parameter(s). |\n"}}
                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"message"}
                              required={false}

                              qualifierMessage={undefined}

                            >
                              
                            </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                              collapsible={false}
                              name={"data"}
                              required={false}

                            </SchemaItem>
                          </div>
